statements: SELECT reform_id, reform_name, implement_date, progress_status, challenges FROM reforms_tracking;
SELECT reform_name, progress_status, challenges FROM reforms_tracking WHERE implement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reforms_tracking ORDER BY progress_status DESC;
SELECT reform_name, challenges FROM reforms_tracking WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT reform_id, reform_name FROM reforms_tracking WHERE challenges LIKE '%challenges%';
SELECT reform_id, reform_name, implement_date, progress_status, challenges FROM reforms_tracking WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT reform_name, progress_status, implement_date FROM reforms_tracking WHERE implement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM reforms_tracking WHERE challenges LIKE '%budget%' ORDER BY reform_id DESC;
SELECT reform_id, reform_name, challenges FROM reforms_tracking ORDER BY implement_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT reform_name, progress_status, implement_date FROM reforms_tracking WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress' AND challenges IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM legal_reforms;
SELECT reform_name, jurisdiction FROM legal_reforms WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_desc FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_id DESC;
SELECT reform_name, jurisdiction FROM legal_reforms WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA' AND reform_name LIKE '%reform%';
SELECT * FROM challenges WHERE reform_id IN (SELECT reform_id FROM legal_reforms WHERE jurisdiction = 'Canada');
SELECT reform_id, reform_name FROM legal_reforms WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM legal_reforms WHERE reform_name LIKE '%justice%';
SELECT implementation_date, COUNT(reform_id) FROM legal_reforms GROUP BY implementation_date;
SELECT lr.reform_name, c.challenge_desc FROM legal_reforms lr JOIN challenges c ON lr.reform_id = c.reform_id WHERE lr.jurisdiction = 'UK';
SELECT reform_name, jurisdiction FROM legal_reforms WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM women_rights_reforms;
SELECT reform_title, enacted_date FROM women_rights_reforms;
SELECT reform_id, implementation_status FROM women_rights_reforms;
SELECT * FROM reform_progress ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT challenge_description, challenge_date FROM reform_challenges WHERE reform_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM women_rights_reforms;
SELECT reform_title, enacted_date FROM women_rights_reforms WHERE enacted_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT rr.reform_title, rp.progress_description FROM women_rights_reforms rr JOIN reform_progress rp ON rr.reform_id = rp.reform_id;

SELECT rc.reform_title, rc.enacted_date, rp.progress_description, rc.challenge_description FROM women_rights_reforms rc JOIN reform_progress rp ON rc.reform_id = rp.reform_id JOIN reform_challenges rcg ON rc.reform_id = rcg.reform_id;

SELECT rr.reform_title, rr.enacted_date, rp.progress_description, rc.challenge_description FROM women_rights_reforms rr LEFT JOIN reform_progress rp ON rr.reform_id = rp.reform_id LEFT JOIN reform_challenges rc ON rr.reform_id = rc.reform_id;
SELECT * FROM legal_reforms;
SELECT reform_name, implementation_date FROM legal_reforms ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT id, challenge_name, resolution_status FROM challenges WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending';
SELECT stakeholder_name, involvement_level, contact_information FROM stakeholders WHERE involvement_level = 'High';
SELECT reform_id, progress_date, progress_update FROM progress_tracking ORDER BY progress_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM legal_reforms;
SELECT reform_name, implementation_date FROM legal_reforms WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT challenge_name, description FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_name DESC;
SELECT stakeholder_name, involvement_level, contact_information FROM stakeholders WHERE involvement_level = 'High' AND contact_information IS NOT NULL;
SELECT r.reform_name, p.progress_date, p.progress_update FROM legal_reforms r JOIN progress_tracking p ON r.id = p.reform_id;
SELECT * FROM reform_status;
SELECT reform_name, implementation_status FROM reform_status;
SELECT reform_name, challenges FROM reform_status ORDER BY reform_id DESC;
SELECT reform_name FROM reform_status WHERE implementation_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT reform_name, implementation_start_date, implementation_end_date FROM reform_details;
SELECT * FROM reform_status;
SELECT reform_name, implementation_status FROM reform_status WHERE implementation_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT reform_description, implementation_start_date FROM reform_details WHERE implementation_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT update_id, reform_id, update_date FROM progress_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT reform_name, impact_type, impact_description FROM reform_status JOIN reform_impact ON reform_status.reform_id = reform_impact.reform_id WHERE impact_type = 'Positive';
